message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $13,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My maximum budget for this product is $8,000.
Bob, I understand your position, but $13,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. To meet you closer to your budget, I can offer it to you for $11,500.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. However, I still believe we can come to an agreement within my budget. How about $9,500?
